com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.shapeeffect

Class SpenLineStyleEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.shapeeffect.SpenLineStyleEffect

  • public class SpenLineStyleEffect
extends Object
    SpenLineStyleEffect class. This class manages style of lines.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(float width)
        Set width of a line.
        Parameters:
        width - Line width. The value of width should not be too big.
        There's no limitation to input value, but huge value may cause lack of memory.
        It's various by user environment, boundary can not be determined. If the size passed is less than 0, the width will set by default value is 0.
        See Also:
        getWidth()

      • getWidth

        public float getWidth()
        Get width of a line.
        Returns:
        Line width.
        See Also:
        setWidth(float)

      • setCompoundType

        public void setCompoundType(int type)
        Set compound type of a line.
        But currently SpenObjectLine supports a compound type of COMPOUND_TYPE_SIMPLE only.
        If other type is set to SpenObjectLine, it will be always displayed as COMPOUND_TYPE_SIMPLE.
        Parameters:
        type - Compound type.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the type is not COMPOUND_TYPE_SIMPLE, COMPOUND_TYPE_DOUBLE or COMPOUND_TYPE_TRIPLE.
        See Also:
        getCompoundType()

      • getCompoundType

        public int getCompoundType()
        Get compound type of a line.
        Returns:
        Compound type.
        See Also:
        setCompoundType(int)
